about_the_game:
Venture into the mysterious world of the Sherlock Holmes adventures with this original soundtrack that captures the enigmatic mood of the classic games. A must have for fans of the brilliant detective or thrilling orchestra music.

Includes soundtrack from the following games:

  • Sherlock Holmes: The Mystery of the Mummy
  • Sherlock Holmes: The Silver Earring
  • Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Remastered Edition
  • Sherlock Holmes - Nemesis
  • Sherlock Holmes versus Jack the Ripper

Composed by Oleksandr Dudko
